features: SURPRISE TOYS: Discover a farm friend surprise in this learning toy's colorful, countable barns
5 ANIMAL FINGER PUPPETS: MEET 5 adorable farm animal finger puppets, including a cow, pig, chicken, and more
LEARNING THAT GROWS WITH YOU: GROWS with you from imaginative puppet play to early math and color recognition
FINE MOTOR SKILLS TOYS: Build fine motor skills with two piece barns sized right for little hands

GIVE THE GIFT OF LEARNING: Whether you’re shopping for holidays, birthdays, or just because, toys from Learning Resources help you discover new learning fun every time you give a gift! Ideal gift for Halloween, Christmas, Stocking Stuffers, Easter Baskets Stuffers or even for Homeschool.
Super Sensory Skills: Sensory fidget toys and activities not only encourage children to explore and investigate, they also help develop motor skills and even build nerve connections in the brain
body.description: There's more than hay inside these barns—there's farmyard learning fun! Kids learn counting, color, matching, and sorting skills during every imaginative adventure with the farm friends found within the Peekaboo Learning Farm from Learning Resources. Each of the set's 5 numbered two-piece barns comes in a different vibrant color, including red, orange, blue, green, and purple. Each barn also pops open to reveal 5 different animal finger puppets—meet the set's friendly cow, pig, chicken, and more! Unlike many toys for toddlers, the Peekaboo Learning Farms grows along with your little one—build new fine motor skills during early games of pretend, then move on to early math and color identification! Find the animals during games of hide and seek, make your own memory game, or just let your imagination go! The Peekaboo Learning Farm's two-piece barns also help kids build coordination and other fine motor skills every time they pop them open or snap them shut.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My one year olds favorite toy right now
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I think the little animals are very cute and made very well. The houses are too. My only problem which is just my problem is that my child may misplace them and has me hunt for the animals she didn’t put back in its home. Overall love this toy/ activity. Keeps my toddler entertained which is my goal always.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars cute, educational, and fun
reviews.reviewText: This is a simple but very cute, fun, and educational toy. My 2.5 year old granddaughter enjoys playing with it, calling out the colors, taking the barn lids off/on, and switching the animals in the different barns. The pieces are made of good quality, sturdy material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and fun
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute and fun game for toddlers. My grandkids play with this for long periods of time, switching up which animals hide in which barn and then having me guess what’s in there. Then it’s there turn to guess after I hide them. It’s great for learning colors and numbers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite toy for baby/toddler
reviews.reviewText: This was my child’s favorite toy for the longest time. It encourages open-ended play and they enjoyed all the different games we were able to come up with. Great quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really great, the animals inside are a nice quality only issue is when closing the barns they’re a bit unstable so they come off easilyBut overall serve their purpose

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and so cute!
reviews.reviewText: My son loves Ms. Rachel and she uses these on her show. They are the perfect size for little hands. Such great quality too! The animals are adorable and easy to handle and clean as well. I’m going to get a few more sets to have on hand for gifts because they are just so good!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Multiple Age Learning
reviews.reviewText: Grand baby has loved this barn set. Started at 10 months, now she’s 20 mo. Begin simple with color and animal recognition. Hand coordination getting roofs on. Logical thinking of which animal is missing, now matching numbers of barns. Good with songs Old MacDonald. Multiple ways to learn and quality of animals is A+. She has yet to tire of them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Learning resources have the best toys. This one is cute and great for learning and exploring.

Love that the little animals are also puppets - there’s a little hold in the bottom that you can put your finger in. The animals are hard and on the heavier side - not light or squeezable bath type of toys. Great quality for everything and I love the learning aspect of this.
Me encantó y mis peques de terapia de lenguaje lo amaron tanto que algunos papis ya lo adquirieron.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: These are great perfect size my Granddaughter lives them
reviews.reviewText: Nothing to dislike . Lovely colours animals in side little barns realistic numbers on outside for counting . A great little learning for little ones

reviews.reviewTitle: Jeu simple, qui a beaucoup plu à un enfant de 18 mois
reviews.reviewText: Jouet parfait pour un enfant de 18 mois. Tout simple, mais très accaparant. Le principe des boîtes où l'on cache les choses est indémodable!
